The ongoing infostealer attacks targeting macOS users may have adopted different methods to compromise victims' Macs, but operate with the end goal of stealing sensitive data, Jamf Threat Labs said in a report published Friday. entry.title: Linux Version of DinodasRAT Spotted in Cyber Attacks Across Several Countries
entry.summary: A Linux version of a multi-platform backdoor called DinodasRAT has been detected in the wild targeting China, Taiwan, Turkey, and Uzbekistan, new findings from Kaspersky reveal. entry.title: Finland Blames Chinese Hacking Group APT31 for Parliament Cyber Attack
entry.summary: The Police of Finland (aka Poliisi) has formally accused a Chinese nation-state actor tracked as APT31 for orchestrating a cyber attack targeting the country's Parliament in 2020. The intrusion, per the authorities, is said to have occurred between fall 2020 and early 2021. entry.title: From Deepfakes to Malware: AI's Expanding Role in Cyber Attacks
entry.summary: Large language models (LLMs) powering artificial intelligence (AI) tools today could be exploited to develop self-augmenting malware capable of bypassing YARA rules.
